channel_hashtag.description:
[single-line only]

The hashtag of the channel which should receive the SMS.

from_number.description: The number of who sending the SMS. The number must be assigned to user or a user group. It will override user_id and sender_group_id.

infer_country_code.description: If true, to_numbers will be assumed to be from the specified user's country, and the E164 format requirement will be relaxed.

media.description:
Base64-encoded media attachment (will cause the message to be sent as MMS).
(Max 500 KiB raw file size)

sender_group_id.description: The ID of an office, department, or call center that the User should send the message on behalf of.

sender_group_type.description: The sender group's type (i.e. office, department, or callcenter).

text.description: The contents of the message that should be sent.

to_numbers.description: Up to 10 E164-formatted phone numbers who should receive the SMS.

user_id.description: The ID of the user who should be the sender of the SMS.
